text.section: Any pawnbroker who violates any of the provisions of KRS 226.020 to 226.050 shall be fined not less than fifty dollars ($50) nor more than five hundred dollars ($500), and his license may be forfeited to the use of the city or county in which the prosecution takes place.
Any pawnbroker or pawnbroker's clerk who violates any of the provisions of KRS 226.060 shall be fined not less than fifty dollars ($50) nor more than five hundred dollars ($500).
Any pawnbroker who violates any of the provisions of KRS 226.070 shall be fined not less than twenty dollars ($20) nor more than one hundred dollars ($100).
Any pawnbroker who violates any of the provisions of KRS 226.080 or 226.090 shall be subject to the penalties provided in subsection (1) of this section.

law.history: Amended 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 237, sec. 4. -- Amended 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 255, sec. 207. -- Amended 1946 Ky. Acts ch. 216, sec. 4. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 2887, 3791, 3794.
